text: @marklevinshow You nincompoop! That is a prescription to treat possible malaria in 2008 NOT Covid19. It is certainly a useful drug for the disease it was developed for . . . MALARIA! No one ever said the drug wasn't useful . . . just that it's usefulness in Covid19 is not proven. SMdamnH!
